description.lang: Honeywells Tuxedo Touch seamlessly integrates security with cameras and Z-Wave enabled Yale Real Living locks, as well as the thermostats, lights, and shades.Honeywells Tuxedo Touch is a 7", high-resolution graphic touchscreen that functions as an integrated security system, home controller, camera viewer and digital picture frame in one.Whether controlling the security system or other functions within the home, the large graphic iconswhich also match the Total Connect interfacesimplify operation.Homeowners can receive important alerts about locking events remotely with Honeywell Total Connect Remote Services.
